description: Teutons are a defensive civilization that excels in building walls and towers, and producing infantry and siege units.
dark_age: Start with 3 villagers and a scout.
Build 2 houses, a mill near berries, and a lumber camp near forests.
Train additional villagers from the town center.
Use the scout to explore the map and find resources.
Advance to Feudal Age at around 16-17 minutes with 500 food and 200 gold.
Have around 800-1000 food, 150-200 wood, and 150-200 gold at the end of the Dark Age.
Assign 4-5 villagers to food, 2-3 to wood, 1-2 to gold, and 3-4 to stone.
feudal_age: Build a blacksmith and a stable to produce knights.
Build a market to trade excess resources for gold.
Advance to Castle Age at around 23-24 minutes with 800 food and 400 gold.
Have around 1500-2000 food, 600-800 wood, 500-600 gold, and 400-500 stone at the end of the Feudal Age.
Assign 8-10 villagers to food, 5-6 to wood, 3-4 to gold, and 6-7 to stone.
castle_age: Build a castle to defend your base and produce Teutonic Knights.
Build a monastery to research technologies for monks.
Research Herbal Medicine and Sanctity to improve the healing ability of monks.
Advance to Imperial Age at around 30-31 minutes with 1000 food, 1000 gold, and 800 stone.
Have around 3500-4000 food, 2000-2500 wood, 1200-1500 gold, and 1200-1500 stone at the end of the Castle Age.
Assign 20-25 villagers to food, 10-12 to wood, 8-10 to gold, and 12-15 to stone.
imperial_age: Produce Teutonic Knights, Siege Onagers, and Bombard Cannons to attack enemy bases.
Build fortified walls and towers to defend your base.
Have around 5000-6000 food, 3000-4000 wood, and 3000-4000 gold in the late Imperial Age.
Assign 40-50 villagers to food, 20-25 to wood, 16-20 to gold, and 25-30 to stone.
